thread.title: Ty Dillon Tweets About Wife After She Makes Hornets Dancing Debut
thread.title_full: Ty Dillon Tweets About Wife After She Makes Hornets Dancing Debut

author: Jeanette Torres
title: Ty Dillon Tweets About Wife After She Makes Hornets Dancing Debut
text:
Share Article 
Robert Laberge/NASCAR via Getty Images (CHARLOTTE, N.C.) -- Ty Dillon is proud of his wife, who is a new member of the dance team for the NBA's Charlotte Hornets.Haley Dillon made her home debut as a member of the "Honey Bees" over the weekend. Her husband, a driver in NASCAR's XFINITY Series, was in Kansas City, Kansas, so he couldn't support her in person at the Hornets' preseason game in Charlotte, North Carolina.He did write a few words of encouragement on Twitter, though, sharing a photo of her on the basketball court and writing, "So proud of my smoking hot wife @HaleyKDillon she cheered her first game as @hornets @thehoneybees !"The couple married last December. 
Copyright   Tuesday, October 20, 2015 at 4:23AM
